name: quadsom3s - #089 - Spectrum 1 - PKDORPLY
description:
Series 1 quadsom3s are unique, limited edition, user-created collectibles created by combining four thr33som3s colored Painting Inserts and one gray Painting Insert during the second phase of the Series 6 Painting Event.  As a group, these quadsom3s comprise thr33som3s SPECTRUM 1.

Each quadsom3s has an AURA comprised of its specific and unique color combination.  Auras are ranked by scarcity and rarity compared to their entire Spectrum.  The number of editions of a given quadsom3s do not effect its Aura ranking, with no ranked difference between a 1/1 and a /10.  As quadsom3s are removed from the Spectrum, Aura rankings will adjust.  A daily update of Aura rankings will be posted in The Grotto discord.

quadsom3s are thr33som3s.  So, all quadsom3s have future utility.

Utilities will be announced, and may be specific to the exact colors included on a given quadsom3s or of its Aura ranking.  Some utilities may be color or Aura agnostic and simply require possession or use of any quadsom3s.

******** digital capture of original painting, gouache on vintage baseball card, 2021. ************ NFT image is for personal use, no commercial rights are granted. Twitter @thr33som3s and IG @thr33somes.  Join The Grotto to stay up to date on all things thr33som3s. ************
